modName: Adonii pretty playable character level 1 savegame
summary: Just a save game of a level one character I made. Start point is just outside Riverwood, inventory includes everything I could pick up on my way to Riverwood. I hate starting a new game and running through Helgen so I thought others might too.
descriptionHtml:
Adonii is a level one character that starts just outside riverwood. You can alter her as you wish using the \"showracemenu\" console command. 
In order for her to appear as in the screenshots you will need the following mods:
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii v 1.5 full
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
 
UNP Replacer Configuration Package by sillumlt- the options I used were the UNP base body with the navetsea skin and fitness body less abs & shaved 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20884

UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics by calyps - xp32 - mrtroublemaker -dimon99 original creator of UNP- v2-2x fixed
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899
I installed this on top of the UNP congfig after trying several BBP options because I like the effect this process renders- feel free to do it your own way

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

LiFE - Lith Face Enhancement -CBBE-UNP-UNPB by LithiumFlower- install last, overwrite if necessary, I love this skin! 
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26354

All credits go to the above mod authors- Thanks!
author: tbowers
